text: "Let There Be Rock" is a 1977 song by Australian hard rock band AC/DC and is third single and title track from their fourth studio album Let There Be Rock. It went to number 82 in Australia. It was also released as a single with the B-side of "Problem Child". Category:1977 songs Category:AC/DC songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Blues rock songs
title: Let There Be Rock (song)
